about_the_game:
Skeleton Hell is a cooperative horror game that takes place in the depths of a underground sanctum where the player's skeletons have been imprisoned. Players must work together and use their bones in order to find their human organs and reclaim their mortality.

In their skeleton state, players are able to employ unique abilities to throw their bones or thow one another in order to solve puzzles and progress through the sanctum!

Throw your bones! 🦴

As a skeleton, bones are your currency. Use bones to interact with the envrionment, distract enemies and give other players a helping hand. However you must be careful. Bones are also your livelihood - the more you lose, the closer you will be to death! 🦴

Avoid deadly enemies! 🦑

The skeleton hell is filled with deadly enemies, each with their own behaviours and patterns. Avoid these monterous creatures as you journey through hell - otherwise you might just end up back in the cell you started in! 💀

Find your heart and reclaim your humanity! ♥

In this game, each player must find their heart hidden somewhere in the procedurally generated sanctum. You will have to search every corner of the small dungeon to find a heart - your ticket to the overworld. If you are feeling generous, you can even communicate with your friends and help them find their own hearts (if you are so fortunate to have found your own). You may also sabotage them and lead them into dangeous traps while luring them with the promise of a heart 😈

Once everyone has a heart and is ready to escape, you must quickly ascend to the top of the dungeon before time runs out. Do you have what it takes to survive?

Other Gameplay Features

  • Proximity Chat 🗣

  • Steam Achievements and Leaderboard 🏆

  • Good Vibez 😎

  • No limit on player count!💀 (But we only tested the game with 4 players 😅, Your mileage may vary!)

Join our community discord!

The Triple Calavera team is eager to learn more about how we could improve Skeleton Hell with your ideas! Join our community discord and chat with us about your experience - both the good and the bad!

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
